title: St. Paul, Minn., Shooting in Crowded Bar Leaves One Dead, 14 Injured
sub_head: Three men are in custody after overnight shooting that police chief described as hellish scene
body:
Three men are in custody after a shooting in a St. Paul, Minn., bar created what the police chief called a hellish scene, with 14 people injured and one dead.
The men are in a hospital being treated for injuries suffered during the shooting. When they are released they will be booked into jail, and a decision will be made about what charges each will face, St. Paul Police Department said on Twitter.
